newsitem.title: FRANCE: Metaleurop raises zinc price again.
newsitem.headline: Metaleurop raises zinc price again.

text.p: Metaleurop SA, a unit of Preussag, said on Monday it had raised its indicative zinc price to 11,980 francs per tonne from 11,260 francs.
It was the second increase in as many business days after the French metal group raised its price from 10,670 francs on Friday.
Zinc reached a seven-year high on the London Metal Exchange on Monday, powered by strong fundamentals and a reduction in stocks, traders said.
